module.name: networkmanager
module.summary: Manager for dynamically switching between networks.

interface.name: networkmanager_rw_udp_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write NetworkManager UDP sockets.

interface.name: networkmanager_rw_packet_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write NetworkManager packet sockets.

interface.name: networkmanager_rw_routing_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write NetworkManager netlink routing sockets.

interface.name: networkmanager_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from NetworkManager over dbus.
